page.title: 15Recreation in Dale
page.content: Some people are keen gardeners.They grow vegetables and flowers which do well in the mild climate.Quite a few of the men and older children like to go fishing.They either go out in their boats or fish from the beaches and rocks.Sailing is also a popular activity.A number of ladies are in the W.I.They have meetings and sometimes put on shows in the village hall.A few people paint and photograph the beautiful scenery.Many people like to go for walks,sometimes taking their dogs and sometimes looking at the sea or the flowers and birds.Also people go to the pub or the Yacht Club where they can meet and talk to their friends and play games and darts.Often people stay in their own homes and watch T.V.
